title: Cookie Policy
subtitle: Cookies
betterExperience: To give you as a user a better experience, Flyttsmart Sverige AB uses cookies on our website.
sessionCookie: We use session-based cookies that disappear when you close your browser and persistent cookies for the purpose of managing login and for increasing security when using our products. Cookies are also used to read user behaviour in order for us to understand how our product is used and how we can improve the experience for you as a user.
collectInfo: To collect information about the use of the website and for support.
services: Services that may be covered by this are, for example
otherServices: Other similar services may be added, such as so-called CRM systems for other trusted partners in social media, advertising and analytics.
browsers: Most browsers are set to allow cookies to be stored. If you do not want to allow cookies, you can either set your browser so that you receive a warning every time a website wants to place a cookie on your computer or turn off the storage of cookies altogether. To learn how to do this, please refer to your browser's help function.
